title: Rights of a person arrested and charged

content.question: The federal Constitution guarantees all of the following rights to a person arrested and charged with a serious crime EXCEPT the right to

choices.label: demand a writ of habeas corpus
receive a speedy and public trial

topic.text: 3.8: Amendments: Due Process and the Rights of the Accused
